metadata.description: Dark Horse Books and Phoenix Labs are thrilled to present the most intimate look at the development of their debut with The Art of Dauntless, a meticulously curated tome filled with hundreds of pieces of art each paired with exclusive commentary from the team that created it. Get an exclusive behind the scenes look at how the world of Dauntless came to be and experience the Shattered Isles in a whole new way!
metadata.name: Dauntless
